meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points of equal underwater depth.
meanings.sent1: The isobaths on the map show where the underwater depth is the same.
meanings.sent2: Cartographers use isobaths to represent underwater depth levels.
meanings.sent3: The isobaths on the map looked like colorful waves under the sea.
meanings.sent4: The isobaths acted as a secret code revealing the hidden depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The isobaths painted a clear picture of the underwater landscape.

meanings.definition: The study or measurement of underwater depth contours.
meanings.sent1: Oceanographers rely on isobaths to understand underwater topography.
meanings.sent2: Isobaths help researchers analyze the variations in underwater depth.
meanings.sent3: During the isobaths study, the scientists discovered a new underwater canyon.
meanings.sent4: The isobaths investigation unveiled the mysteries of the ocean floor.
meanings.sent5: The isobaths research shed light on the hidden world beneath the waves.
